game.synopsis: Here is the synopsis of the game: The story has two chapters. During the first chapter the player will travel through a vast open world and explore the environment. As the player discovers more of the map they gain access to more areas and resources. They can use these resources to craft weapons and armor that they can use throughout the game. During the second chapter the player learns that the game’s antagonist is coming for them and they have to set up a massive trap to take them out. One of the best parts of this game is that you can customize your character a lot. You can change their looks, their personality and even how they use their skills. There is an emphasis on the player creating their own story, so it feels truly like your game.
game.beginning: The beginning of the game takes place in a peaceful village where the player's journey starts.
game.ending: In the thrilling climax, the player successfully triggers the trap and defeats the antagonist, saving the world from destruction.
